scripts.prepare-preinstall: npx -y only-allow pnpm && node -e "if(process.env.STACK_SKIP_TEMPLATE_GENERATION !== 'true') require('child_process').execSync('npx --package=ts-node ts-node ./scripts/generate-sdks.ts')"
scripts.prepare: pnpm prepare-preinstall && pnpm pnpm run generate-docs
scripts.build:dev: pnpm prepare && NODE_ENV=development pnpm run build
scripts.restart-dev-in-background: pnpm prepare && pnpm run kill-dev:named && (pnpm run dev:named > dev-server.log.untracked.txt 2>&1 &) && echo 'Starting dev server in background... (Logs are in dev-server.log.untracked.txt)' && npx wait-on http://localhost:8102 -t 120000 && echo 'Dev server running.'
scripts.restart-dev-environment: pnpm prepare && concurrently "pnpm run build:packages && pnpm run codegen" "pnpm run restart-deps" && pnpm run restart-dev-in-background
scripts.stop-dev-environment: pnpm prepare && pnpm run kill-dev:named && pnpm run stop-deps
scripts.clean: pnpm prepare-no-codegen && turbo run clean && rimraf --glob **/.next && rimraf --glob **/.turbo && rimraf .turbo && rimraf --glob **/node_modules
scripts.codegen: pnpm prepare && turbo run codegen && pnpm run generate-sdks
scripts.stop-deps: POSTGRES_DELAY_MS=0 pnpm run deps-compose kill && POSTGRES_DELAY_MS=0 pnpm run deps-compose down -v
scripts.init-db: pnpm prepare && pnpm run prisma db push && pnpm run prisma db seed
scripts.wait-until-postgres-is-ready:pg_isready: until pg_isready -h localhost -p 5432; do sleep 1; done
scripts.wait-until-postgres-is-ready: command -v pg_isready >/dev/null 2>&1 && pnpm run wait-until-postgres-is-ready:pg_isready || sleep 10  # not everyone has pg_isready installed, so we fallback to sleeping
scripts.start-deps:no-delay: pnpm prepare && pnpm run deps-compose up --detach --build && pnpm run wait-until-postgres-is-ready && pnpm run init-db && echo "\nDependencies started in the background as Docker containers. 'pnpm run stop-deps' to stop them"n
scripts.restart-deps: pnpm prepare && pnpm run stop-deps && pnpm run start-deps
scripts.restart-deps:no-delay: pnpm prepare && pnpm run stop-deps && pnpm run start-deps:no-delay
scripts.explain-query:
pnpm prepare && echo 'Paste your query (end with Ctrl-D):' && query=$(cat) && echo 'Connecting to Postgres...' && printf "EXPLAIN (ANALYZE, COSTS, VERBOSE, BUFFERS, FORMAT JSON)
$query" | pnpm run --silent psql -qAt | sed -n '/\[/,$p' > explained-query.untracked.json && echo 'Explained query saved to explained-query.untracked.json. To analyze it, open it in the query analyzer at https://tatiyants.com/pev/#/plans/new'
scripts.dev: concurrently -k "pnpm run generate-sdks:watch" "pnpm run generate-docs:watch" "turbo run dev --concurrency 99999"
scripts.dev:basic: concurrently -k "pnpm run generate-sdks:watch" "pnpm run generate-docs:watch" "turbo run dev --concurrency 99999 --filter=@stackframe/stack-backend --filter=@stackframe/stack-dashboard --filter=@stackframe/mock-oauth-server"
scripts.kill-dev:named: (pgrep -f 'stack-named-dev-server' | xargs -r -n1 pkill -P); echo 'Killed named dev server (if found). Sleeping to give some time for it to shut down...' && sleep 10
scripts.verify-data-integrity: pnpm prepare && pnpm -C apps/backend run verify-data-integrity
